album.title: A Rush of Blood to the Head

track.name: Daylight
comments: I love this song so much.
chris martin looks a lot like james morrison
Wonderful. One of my favorites from 'A Rush of Blood to the Head'.
I don't really like coldplay but this song is pretty good.
I'm pretty indifferent to pre-Eno Coldplay, some of it is terrible - but this is a fantastic song.
taylor eigsti's cover of this was amazing as well.
I hear this play at work and it's so rad
simply great. they were so uber at 'Rock im Park' ... i'm still hoarse from all the singing (bawling in my case '-_-). awesome to the max.
First number of Coldplay I really like. I should give them a second chance.
I wish u could understand this music
miss old-fashioned Coldplay like this so much!...
